name: Diebus Tarde
description:
Diebus Tarde, Latin for slow time.

Made for the Scratch Jam 2021, hosted by SpicyGame.

Everything in the project was made by me or taken from the Scratch library. Nothing was taken from external sources or other Scratch projects.

View it on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/549915357/

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Hold RMB to shoot.

Hold SPACE to slow down time. This consumes from your Energy bar

Gain Energy from defeating zombies.

Press M to mute the music.

you can also press 0 for a bunch of developery stuff but nobody cares about that.
